Containers.Name: Tmux Terminal Manager (TTM)
Containers.Description: Easily open and manage multiple persistent terminal sessions in the Unraid Web GUI. Leave your terminals and come back at any later time to check on your long-running operations. This plugin installs Tmux, if it is not already present on your system.
Containers.Changes: ###2024.12.26 - release note: welcome to the first version of the plugin - release note: please report any issues in the support thread on the forums
